class-data-missing: Class missing data, mandatory fields are 'weekday' and 'time'
invalid-class-duration: Invalid class duration, should be a number from 30 to 120
invalid-class-time: Invalid class time, should be in the format of RFC 3339
invalid-class-weekday: Invalid class weekday, possible values are: 'sunday', 'monday', 'tuesday', 'wednesday', 'thursday', 'friday' and 'saturday'
